sentence.Network_en: Common sense, or intuition, or selfevident truths derives from man's perceptions of the world about him.
sentence.Network_cn: 常识, 或直觉, 或显然的事实,来源于人们对周围世界的感觉.

PerfectNetExp.abs: selfevidence 自我证明, selfevident 自明, selfevidence 自明性
在这里,“自明的(Selfevident)”一词,是基督教文化中的惯用语,其意义,就如阿莫斯(GaryAamos)说:它是指“无需证明,借着上帝的直接启示,通过直觉来认识的真理。.
selfevident 自明, selfevident 自足性, selfevident 自明性的

list.abs: selfevaluation 自评, selfevidence 自我证明, selfevaluation 自评价
selfevaluation 自评价, selfevidence 自明性, selfevidence 自我证明
common sense , or intuition , or selfevident truths derives from man's perceptions of the world about him .常识，或直觉，或显然的事实，来源于人们对周围世界的感觉。

entry.tran: 不证自明的;不言而喻的;明摆着的
entry.def: A fact or situation that is self-evident is so obvious that there is no need for proof or explanation.

example.ex: It is self-evident that we will never have enough resources to meet the demand...
example.tran: 不言而喻，我们永远都不会有足够的资源来满足需求。

example.ex: The implications for this country are self-evident.
example.tran: 对该国的影响显而易见。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
